bug.author: IISCAditayTripathi
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Common bugs:</denchmark-h>
Tensorboard not showing in Jupyter-notebook see issue 79. PyTorch 1.1.0 vs 1.2.0 support see FAQ
I am getting the following bug while importing pytorch_lightning <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42270643/65712498-ce37a880-e0b4-11e9-9f6b-a2286a161116.PNG></denchmark-link>
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Open terminal type "python3" type "import pytorch_lightning" and press "Enter" See error
Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: [e.g. iOS] Browser [e.g. chrome, safari] CUDA 10.1 python 3.7

comments.comment: looks like you're not in your cuda environment and not using python 3.6+ (the first line after python3 says: "Python 3.5.2..."
